title: Melissa & Doug Sunny Patch Cutie Pie Butterfly Binoculars - Pretend Play Toy
features: Child-friendly binoculars with a butterfly theme
Encourages observation skills and interest in the natural world
description: Your child's interest in the environment will fly high with Cutie Pie Butterfly when looking through these child-friendly binoculars! Help kids ages 2+ focus on the natural world with these adjustable field glasses to view distant objects in close-up detail. Cutie Pie brings good cheer to her friends in Sunny Patch and adds an adorable twist to a classic tool that helps develop observation skills and encourages kids to get up and get playing.

From classic wooden toys to crafts, pretend play, and games, Melissa & Doug products provide a launch pad to ignite imagination and a sense of wonder in all children so they can discover themselves, their passions, and their purpose.  Since the company’s founding more than 25 years ago, Melissa & Doug has consistently delivered innovative products that inspire open-ended thinking, encourage kids to see new possibilities, and offer Countless Ways to Play. It’s part of a bigger vision to Take Back Childhood. Because by giving children a true childhood with the space and freedom to explore their world, we give them a path to realizing their full potential!
